price: 59 à l’exception de la famille de Loth dont tous les membres seront épargnés.
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
